page.title: 07HOME LIFE 2
page.content: The day in the life of an 11 year old boy. Karl Jones. In my typical week day the 24 hours are broken down like this: 9hours 30 minutes.....SLEEP 8 hours 30 minutes....LEISURE TIME 5 hours ..............WORK AT SCHOOL 0 hours 30 minutes ...TRAVEL 0 hours 30 minutes ...EATING. Total ...24 hours. These times are approximate. At weekends I spend nearly all day in leisure activities. During the 5 hours at school I have a 15 minute break in the morning one and a quarter hours break for lunch and a further 15 minute break in the afternoon session of school. The five hours at school is very highly organised. (see page 8)
